name: Solana
fullText:
Dear founders:

- Preserve runway & survive until you're inevitable
- Cut personal burnrate, be a cockroach
- Ship early and often and in public
- Join @superteam, @colosseum, @alliance, etc. to accelerate time to market and growth
- Find a cofounder for emotional balance
- Don't
